summary: Proved addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position lemma - key infrastructure for foldl preservation proofs. Reduced sorries in RecursiveSeed.lean from 23 to 21.

partial_progress.details: Proved key lemma addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position. This enables foldl_addFormula_preserves_mem_general and foldl_addFormula_fam_preserves_mem_general to work. Remaining phase 1 sorries require buildSeedAux_preserves_getFormulas lemma.

completion_data.completion_summary: Proved addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position lemma enabling foldl membership preservation proofs in RecursiveSeed.lean. Build succeeds with 21 sorries (reduced from 23).
